alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 10:33AM AKST until January 22 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES ACROSS THE CENTRAL AND NORTHERN PANHANDLE... .Snowfall continues across the panhandle with some pockets of freezing rain along the transition zone between Wrangell and Kake and up to Yakutat. Over the inner channels near Juneau, snow has started to become wetter. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of around one inch and ice accumulations of up to a tenth. * WHERE...Angoon and Kake. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will warm across the Kake area earlier than Angoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
